parameters.name: NumberOfFeatures
parameters.description: Number of features in this body in a multibody sheet metal part

title: IBody2.IGetFeatures
description: Gets the features in this body in a multibody sheet metal part.

parameters.name: NumberOfFeatures
parameters.description: Number of features in this body in a multibody sheet metal part

returns: in-process, unmanaged C++: Pointer to an array of features in this body in a multibody sheet metal part VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported See In-process Methods for details about this type of method.
remarks:
Before calling this method, call
IBody2::GetFeatureCount
to get NumberOfFeatures.
The features of a body in a multibody sheet metal part are located in the solid bodies folder in the FeatureManager design tree.
